define: Only available for Brazil sellers. Use this API to upload KML file for shop level serviceability setting for BR Entrega Turbo channel (Channel ID: 90026). Please note that multiple Outlet Shops under the same Mart Shop cannot have overlapping service areas.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: File size exceeds max allowable size.

error_list.name: error_shop
error_list.description: Shop is not eligible to upload file as instant channel is not enabled

error_list.name: error_network
error_list.description: Internal api called failed. Please try again later.

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: System error. Please try again later.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The .kml file to be uploaded to denote the serviceability area of the shops.


Note: Please refer to “KML file format for v2.logistics.upload_serviceable_polygon” to understand the structure specifications and upload requirements for KML files.

","name":"file","sample":"","type":"file","required":"True","key":"HmzSZZa"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"error_param","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"WPekCJS"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"File size exceeds max allowable size.","type":"string","required":null,"key":"pfrfRDR"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"a316752d608baf000b2c73e2e5eed5c8","type":"string","required":null,"key":"Mwbhnf"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"hQeEibF","children":[{"description":"

Use the task_id to call v2.logistics.check_polygon_update_status to check if the upload job has been completed.

","name":"task_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"cQdhyBN"}]}]}
